projects.name: Startup Studio
projects.description: A comprehensive platform connecting startups with experienced mentors across various domains. Find the expertise you need to grow your venture, from technical guidance to business strategy.

projects.name: IITH Dashboard
projects.description: An all-in-one utility application designed for IIT Hyderabad students. Features include real-time campus bus tracking, interactive campus maps, personalized timetables, cab sharing coordination, and a lost & found system.

projects.name: CampusNet
projects.description: A social networking app exclusively for IIT Hyderabad students. Connect with peers across different degrees, branches, batches, and hostels. Features include advanced filtering, direct messaging, and community building tools.

projects.name: Bioverse
projects.description: A full-stack, cross-platform application connecting social causes with NGOs. Built with Flutter for seamless experience across web, mobile, and desktop platforms.

projects.name: NPCI Hackathon Project
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with secure authentication, role-based access control, order processing, and customer loyalty rewards system.
